title: nlopt build problem - CMakeLists.txt missing
body:
This is a new package to my spack build.  I have not added any variant args just ```spack install nlopt```

### Expected Result

clean build

### Actual Result

==> Installing nlopt
curl: (37) Couldn't open file MIRROR_DIR/mirror/nlopt/nlopt-2.4.2.tar.gz
==> Fetching file://MIRROR_DIR/mirror/nlopt/nlopt-2.4.2.tar.gz

==> Created stage in WORKING_DIR/var/spack/stage/nlopt-2.4.2-wei4zixpd7mb2b7zn2uniak5svelp6wb
